law.history: Repealed 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 29, effective July 1, 2007. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 416, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. VII A, sec. 620, effective July 1, 1990. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 233, sec. 27, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 40, Part I, sec. 7. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 5, Art. I, sec. 57.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Use tax on machinery brought into state for construction project.
